attributes.action: You offer the opportunity to petition, listen, don't manipulate and control.
attributes.additional_details: Start listening, or you may get found out!
attributes.background: You offer the public the opportunity to have a say. But biasly manipulate the accepted content. We see this on a daily basis. This 'petition' site has become a place of little more than lip service. I would suggest that you stop seeing the public as fools.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
